description:
Chip is Adorable with a capital A! I know you have already seen his sex scene, so it seems out of order, but I thought a proper introduction was now in order.
He has a fun frisky quirky charm about him. Super polite, and very adventurous.
Chip hadn't really thought out that he was flying across the country to masturbate, and had sex the night before. He realized during the photos that he wasn't quite as horny as he thought he was going to be.
But we found some porn that he liked, which was actually pretty easy. He had a red-head girlfriend that ended poorly, so anything else was on the viewing table.
We stuck to blondes, and since he tends to use his imagination when he jerks-off, it was easy for him to get into his own head and stroke for us.
He only showed up to do the solo, but after finishing it, he decided he wanted to do a Serviced video.
I hadn't planned on it, and was booked solid the following day. He reminded me that he was staying for a week to visit an old girlfriend, so we had plenty of opportunity.
So tune in next week, where I step in to give him some 'emergency' oral Servicing.
title: Chip - Solo
